title: Aadhya Chakra Stud Earrings - Timeless Elegance
features: The earrings feature a circular 'chakra' (wheel) design, a powerful symbol of completeness and time. The central emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The delicate filigree work with leaf motifs, reminiscent of South Indian traditional designs, adds to the unique charm. The earrings have a secure push-back closure. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability.
occasions: half-saree function or a special occasion. Their versatile design allows for both traditional and modern styling.
description: These earrings seamlessly blend traditional South Indian artistry with a modern aesthetic. The use of high-quality materials, including a natural emerald and brilliant-cut diamonds, ensures lasting beauty. The 'chakra' design carries symbolic weight, representing wholeness and eternal beauty. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich luster that is long-lasting. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
